question: The Defence Acquisitions Council, DAC chaired by Defence Minister _______approved indigenous construction of six submarines worth 40 thousand crore rupees.
description: The Defence Acquisitions Council, DAC chaired by Defence Minister Nirmala Sitharaman approved indigenous construction of six submarines worth 40 thousand crore rupees. It is the second project under the Ministry's ambitious strategic partnership model aiming to boost the government's Make in India' program

question: The country's unemployment rate stood at a 45-year-high of _____in 2017-18, according to the National Sample Survey Office's (NSSO's) periodic labour force survey (PLFS).
description: The country's unemployment rate stood at a 45-year-high of 6.1 per cent in 2017-18, according to the National Sample Survey Office's (NSSO's) periodic labour force survey (PLFS).

question: Which State's government has approved the Smart Village Campaign to boost infrastructure and facilities in rural areas?
description: In a major initiative to boost infrastructure and facilities in rural areas, the Punjab government on Tuesday approved the Smart Village Campaign with an outlay of Rs 384.40 crore. The decision was taken at a Cabinet meeting here under the chairmanship of Chief Minister Amarinder Singh. The campaign is based on the premise that each village would achieve goals in different fields like infrastructure, health, education and environment.

question: The 13th edition of Men's Cricket World Cup will be played in India in which Year?
description: International Cricket Council CEO and former South Africa cricketer David Richardson announced that the 13th edition of Men's Cricket World Cup will be played in India in 2023.

question: ____takes charge as Chief Commissioner of CGST.
description: G V Krishna Rao assumed charge as Chief Commissioner of CGST, Central Excise & Customs, Guwahati Zone having jurisdiction over all the North Eastern States. A CGST press release here said Krishna Rao, an officerof the 1987 batch of the Indian Revenue Service (Indirect Taxes & Customs), is a senior officer of the Central Board of Indirect Taxes & Customs (CBIC) .

question: 34th international leather festival begins in which State?
description: The 34th edition of India International Leather Fair (IILF) will kick off in Chennai, highlighting the export prowess of Indian leather entrepreneurs, the industry's achievements, use of latest technologies and innovations with an eco-friendly tag.

question: The _____ government will implement the "Tejashri financial services" scheme to help rural women
description: The Maharashtra government will implement the "Tejashri financial services" scheme to help rural women, state Finance Minister Sudhir Mungantiwar said. it would be implemented by the state's Mahila Arthik Vikas Mahamandal (MAVIM) and would help understand the needs of rural women and bring them into the mainstream of development.

question: Former Planning Commission member and ex-director of IIMC _____ passed away
description: Former Planning Commission member and ex-director of IIMC Hiten Bhaya passed away at his residence in south Delhi's Vasant Kunj . Bhaya was a member of the Planning Commission in the Rajiv Gandhi government and had also served as director of the Indian Institute of Mass Communication (IIMC) and chairman of Hindustan Steel.

question: _____became the first Indian to earn a card for the Australian Ladies PGA Tour (LPGA) after coming through its first-ever Qualifying Tournament at the Ballarat Golf Club in Ballarat, Australia.
description: Vani Kapoor became the first Indian to earn a card for the Australian Ladies PGA Tour (LPGA) after coming through its first-ever Qualifying Tournament at the Ballarat Golf Club in Ballarat, Australia. Vani shot rounds of 71, 78 and 69 to finish at two-over 218 and was tied-12th with three others. The top-20 from a field of 81 earned playing rights on the Australian LPGA but there were many other benefits and spots available too.

question: The World Wetlands Day is observed on which date?
description: World Wetlands Day occurs annually on February 2nd, marking the date of the adoption of the Convention on Wetlands on February 2, 1971. Established to raise awareness about the value of wetlands for humanity and the planet, WWD was celebrated for the first time in 1997 and has grown remarkably since then. The international theme for World Wetlands Day 2019 is 'Wetlands and Climate Change'

question: Who has been appointed as the new Director of the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI)?
description: Twenty-two days after Alok Verma was ousted as CBI chief, the Centre appointed Rishi Kumar Shukla, a 1983-batch IPS officer of the Madhya Pradesh cadre, the agency's new Director. Shukla was the Madhya Pradesh police chief until January when he was transferred by the Kamal Nath government as chairman of police housing.

question: The government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with tech giant Microsoft, to transform the educational landscape in the state
description: Aiming to transform the educational landscape in the state, the Sikkim government has signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) with tech giant Microsoft. Sikkim Minister for Human Resource Development RB Subba said the state government was committed to harnessing the power of technology to transform e-governance and core sectors and partnering with Microsoft was a much-needed step to help prepare the future generation.The government's vision was to make the youth future-ready and Microsoft was an able partner for transformational initiatives.

question: PNB MetLife, a life insurance company, signed _____as its brand ambassador.
description: PNB MetLife, a life insurance company, signed P.V. Sindhu as its brand ambassador. She is respected by contemporaries, created a fan following across generations with athleticism and aggression on court. The shuttler conquered some of the biggest names in women's badminton.

question: The Ministry of Finance has decided to merge two regional rural banks and name the new entity as Tamil Nadu Grama Bank,The banks include Pallavan Grama Bank and ______________.
description: The Ministry of Finance has decided to merge two regional rural banks and name the new entity as Tamil Nadu Grama Bank.The banks include Pallavan Grama Bank (Sponsored by Indian Bank) and Pandyan Grama Bank (Sponsored by Indian Overseas Bank). The new entity, namely Tamil Nadu Grama Bank, will be under the sponsorship of Indian Bank, with its head office in Salem. The merger would be effective from April 1, 2019.

question: Which government has launched the 'KALIA Chhatra Bruti' programme so that the children of the farmers excel in the future?
description: Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik on Sunday announced the 'KALIA Chhatra Bruti', which will provide scholarships to the children of the KALIA scheme beneficiaries for pursuing higher education.the government has launched the 'KALIA Chhatra Bruti' programme so that the children of the farmers excel in the future.

question: Punjab Chief Minister_________ gave approval to declare the endangered Indus River dolphin as the state aquatic animal.
description: Punjab Chief Minister Amarinder Singh gave approval to declare the endangered Indus River dolphin, found only in the Beas River in the country, as the state aquatic animal.

question: Who has taken charge as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Corporation Bank?
description: PV Bharathi has taken charge as the Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer of the Corporation Bank.She was responsible for many key areas, including human resources, corporate credit, retail banking, credit monitoring, recovery, risk management, information and technology, audit and inspection, international banking, treasury and others in the Canara Bank.

question: Which country's Army successfully test-fired the short range surface-to-surface ballistic missile 'Nasr'?
description: Pakistan Army successfully test-fired the short range surface-to-surface ballistic missile 'Nasr' which it claimed can defeat any ballistic missile defence system now available in the country's neighbourhood or any other system being developed.

question: Which Payment Bank has announced the launch of a sweep account facility in association with Suryoday Small Finance Bank (SSFB) ?
description: Fino Payments Bank (FPB) has announced the launch of a sweep account facility in association with Suryoday Small Finance Bank (SSFB) . This partnership will help FPB address the issue of deposit limits that all the payment banks face at the moment.

question: Sushma Swaraj and Nitin Gadkari inaugurated 30th National Road Safety Week in New Delhi, What is theme for the year 2019?
description: External Affairs Minister Smt Sushma Swaraj and Union Minister for Road Transport & Highways, Shipping and Water Resources, River Development and Ganga Rejuvenation Shri Nitin Gadkari inaugurated the 30th National Road Safety Week, 2019 at Gandhi Smriti and Darshan, Rajghat, New Delhi.The main aim of the event is to generate awareness and sensitizing people about safe road usage. The theme of the 30th National Road Safety Week is "Sadak Suraksha-Jeevan Raksha".

question: ________ has become the first State to set up a price monitoring and research unit (PMRU) to track violation of prices of essential drugs and medical devices under the Drugs Price Control Order (DPCO).
description: Kerala has become the first State to set up a price monitoring and research unit (PMRU) to track violation of prices of essential drugs and medical devices under the Drugs Price Control Order (DPCO).The move comes more than five years after the National Pharmaceutical Pricing Authority (NPPA) proposed such a system for the States and the Union Territories.

question: Former Pakistan women's cricket team skipper ______ became the first Asian woman cricketer to play hundred T20 international matches.
description: The 33-year-old reached the milestone when she walked into the field for the ongoing third and final T20I against West Indies in Karachi.

question: Haryana Hammers beat ______ to win Pro Wrestling League (PWL) season 4 title.
description: It was fourth time lucky for Haryana Hammers as they beat Punjab Royals 6-3 in the summit clash to win the Pro Wrestling League (PWL) season 4 title

question: _______ government has set up a committee to review various schemes being implemented for the welfare of tribals in the state.The 17-member committee, headed by former MLA and Shramjeevi Sanghatna president Vivek Pandit.
description: The Maharashtra government has set up a committee to review various schemes being implemented for the welfare of tribals in the state. The 17-member committee, headed by former MLA and Shramjeevi Sanghatna president Vivek Pandit, will undertake study of various works done for providing employment opportunities, minimum wages and proper livelihood to tribals, as per a recent government order.

question: ________won his fourth major title the Seattle Open by beating Egypt's Mohamed El Sherbini in the final.
description: Top seeded Ramit Tandon made the most of his first meeting with Egyptian Mohamed El Sherbini to win the final of the Seattle Open, a PSA challenger squash Tour event here late on Saturday night. The Indian won 11-4, 11-7, 2-11, 11-2 for his first PSA title in 2019 and fourth title overall in his career.

question: Minister of State for Agriculture Gajendra Singh Shekhawat launched a mobile application _______ to provide advisory services to dairy farmers.
description: Minister of State for Agriculture Gajendra Singh Shekhawat launched a mobile application developed by Australia-based agri-tech company MoooFarm to provide advisory services to dairy farmers. MoooFarm, founded by Param Singh, is a mobile application that provides end-to-end last-mile connectivity solution offering extension and technology to the smallholder dairy farmers.

question: Vidarbha defeated ______ by 78 runs to win Ranji Trophy 2018-19 edition.
description: Vidarbha defeated Saurashtra by 78 runs to win Ranji Trophy 2018-19 edition and lift the coveted domestic trophy for the second consecutive time. It took only one session on Day 5 for the Faiz Fazal-led Vidarbha to dismiss Saurashtra for 127 in the final match, which was played at the Vidarbha Cricket Association in Nagpur.

question: Which Country will host 2019 African Cup of Nations?
description: Seven-time champions Egypt have won the hosting rights for the 2019 edition of the African Cup of Nations. Egypt beat South Africa by 16 votes to one at the Confederation of African Football's (CAF) Executive Committee.

question: The World Bank has projected India's economic growth at _____in the 2018-19 financial year.
description: The World Bank has projected India's economic growth at 7.3% in the ongoing financial year and 7.5% in the two years after that.

question: On which Date the interim budget for 2019 will be presented during the budget session of the Parliament?
description: The 2019 interim Budget will be presented by Finance Minister Arun Jaitley on 1 February during the Budget Session of Parliament

question: Who has Become 1st Indian to Head Global Solar Council?
description: A visionary in the field of Solar Energy and the chairman of National Solar Energy Federation, Pranav R Mehta, has taken over as the president of Global Solar Council (GSC) . He has become the first Indian to head the GSC.

question: With Which Commercial Bank, Indian Army was signed An MoU on the Defence Salary Package?
description: a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) was signed between the Indian Army and PNB on the Defence Salary Package. The signing ceremony was chaired by the Adjutant General, Lt Gen Ashwani Kumar and was attended by top dignitaries of PNB headed by Mr Naveen Kumar. A number of additional facilities have been incorporated in the MoU after concerted efforts. The Army hopes this MoU will benefit a large number of serving and retired Army personnel who have accounts with PNB and also provide them an opportunity to access modern banking facilities.

question: The second edition of Khelo India Youth Games has officially begun at which City in Maharashtra.
description: Maharashtra is all set to host the second edition of Khelo India Youth Games which will officially begin tomorrow in Pune. More than 9000 players from different states will participate in 18 different games at Khelo India Youth Games. It has already been announced that Youth Olympic Gold Medallist in shooting Manu Bhaker and Saurabh Chaudhari, as well as weightlifter Jeremy Lalrinnunga, will be among the cream of India's youth sporting talent competing at these games.

question: The Lok Sabha passed the contentious Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2019, that seeks to provide citizenship to non-Muslims from Bangladesh, Pakistan and _________.
description: The Lok Sabha on Tuesday passed the contentious Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2019, that seeks to provide citizenship to non-Muslims from Bangladesh, Pakistan and Afghanistan. Home Minister Rajnath Singh, who introduced the Bill in the Lok Sabha, said the six communities - Hindus, Jains, Christians, Sikhs, Buddhists and Parsis from Bangladesh, Pakistan and Afghanistan - faced "discrimination and religious persecution" and they "have no place to go, except India.

question: Australian cities______ and Brisbane have been announced as the first two host locations for the newest team event in men's tennis for the multi-million dollar ATP Cup from 2020.
description: Australian cities Sydney and Brisbane have been announced as the first two host locations for the newest team event in men's tennis. The ATP Cup will feature on the calendar for the first time from January 2020.

question: Market regulator Security and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has constituted a "Research Advisory" committee, Who is the Head of this Committee?
description: Market regulator Security and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has constituted a "Research Advisory" committee which will assist in formulating policy to undertake research relevant for development and regulation of capital markets. According to SEBI, the committee would comprise prominent financial economists and market practitioners. It will be headed by Sankar De.

question: Hockey India removes _____as senior men's team coach.
description: Hockey India has decided to remove senior men's team coach Harendra Singh and asked him to go back to coaching the junior men's team once again. After India's disappointing show at the Hockey World Cup in Bhubaneswar

question: PM Narendra Modi launched "Gangajal Project" to Provide Better and More Assured Water Supply in Place?
description: Giving a major push to develop and enhance Tourism infrastructure in Agra, the Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi launched a series of development projects worth Rs. 2900 Crores for the Agra city and the adjoining areas. The Prime Minister dedicated to the nation, Gangajal project, which will provide Agra with better and more assured water supply, at an estimated cost of Rs.2880 crores. Gangajal project aims to bring 140 cusecs of Ganga water to Agra. This will help meet the drinking water demands in the city.

question: Which Among the following Countries has topped 2019 list of world's most powerful passports.
description: Singapore remains tied with South Korea as the world's second-most powerful passport, granting visa-free or visa-on-arrival access to 189 destinations.

question: Madagascar's High Constitutional Court has declared former ______as the winner of the country's bitterly contested presidential election.
description: Madagascar's High Constitutional Court has declared former leader Andry Rajoelina as the winner of the country's bitterly contested presidential election. Madagascar Capital : Antananarivo Currencies: Malagasy ariary, Iraimbilanja

question: The PM dedicated to the nation the 58 km four-laned, Solapur - Tuljapur - Osmanabad section of NH-211 (New NH-52). Solapur is located in the south-western region of Which Indian state?
description: The PM dedicated to the nation the 58 km four-laned, Solapur - Tuljapur - Osmanabad section of NH-211 (New NH-52). The project is part of a larger project for four laning of 98.717 km Solapur - Yedashi section of NH-211, at a cost of Rs.972.50 crore. It will help improve the connectivity of Solapur with the important Marathwada region of Maharashtra and give a boost to the tourism and economy of the region.

question: USA Cricket achieved a significant milestone on Tuesday as it was inducted as the __________member of the International Cricket Council (ICC) .
description: The International Cricket Council is the global governing body of cricket. It was founded as the Imperial Cricket Conference in 1909 by representatives from Australia, England and South Africa. It was renamed as the International Cricket Conference in 1965, and took up its current name in 1989. Chairperson: Shashank Manohar Headquarters: Dubai, United Arab Emirates CEO: Dave Richardson Motto: Cricket for good

question: According to Standard Chartered, which country will be the largest Economy in the world by 2020?
description: India is likely to become the world's second-largest economy by 2030, next only to China and overtaking the US.

question: Monetary Policy Committee(MPC) consists of how many Members?
description: The meetings of the Monetary Policy Committee are held at least 4 times a year and it publishes its decisions after each such meeting. The committee comprises six members - three officials of the Reserve Bank of India and three external members nominated by the Government of India.

question: Pravasi Bharatiya Divas (PBD) is celebrated on which date?
description: Pravasi Bharatiya Divas (PBD) is celebrated on 9th January every year to mark the contribution of Overseas Indian community in the development of India.

question: Where is the Headquarters of Dena Bank?
description: Dena Bank is headquartered in Mumbai and it has 1874 branches. The bank was founded in 1938 and the Indian government nationalized it in 1969. CEO: Shri Karnam Sekar.

question: ______________has signed a term loan agreement for Rs 5,000 crore with State Bank of India.
description: State-owned power giant NTPC said that it has signed a term loan agreement for Rs 5,000 crore with State Bank of India. The loan facility is extended at an interest rate linked to 3-Month MCLR of the Bank. This loan has a door to door tenure of 15 years and will be utilised to part finance the capital expenditure of NTPC.

question: India signs contract with _________ firm for 72,400 assault rifles.
description: The Army signed a contract with Sig Sauer of the U.S. for 72,400 SIG 716 assault rifles for the frontline soldier deployed in operational areas.

question: A Bill Introduced in Rajya Sabha For NRI Men To Register Marriage Within _____________.
description: Against the backdrop of cases of Indian women being trapped in fraudulent marriages with non-resident Indians (NRI), a bill was introduced in Rajya Sabha to make it compulsory to register such marriages within 30 days.If an NRI man fails to register his marriage within 30 days of date of marriage, his passport can be impounded or revoked.

question: Commerce & Industry Minister launched which online export awareness course to train, mentor and hand-hold potential exporters so as to help them to tap international trade opportunities.
description: on Board of Trade Meeting, Commerce & Industry Minister launched a new online "Anytime-Anywhere" export awareness course to train, mentor and hand-hold potential exporters so as to help them to tap international trade opportunities.

question: Meghalaya state animal ____________ was chosen as the mascot for the upcoming National Games to be hosted by the state in 2022.
description: Meghalaya state animal 'Clouded Leopard' was chosen as the mascot for the upcoming National Games to be hosted by the state in 2022. At the first meeting of the Executive Committee of the National Games 2022 chaired by Meghalaya sports minister Banteidor Lyngdoh

question: Sikkim chief minister ______ was conferred with the honorary Doctorate of Literature [Honoris Causa] by Desh Bhagat University at Gobindgarh in Punjab.
description: Sikkim chief minister Pawan Chamling was conferred with the honorary Doctorate of Literature [Honoris Causa] by Desh Bhagat University at Gobindgarh in Punjab.

question: US investment bank ______ has created a crypto-currency to help settle payments between clients in its wholesale payments business.
description: US investment bank JP Morgan has created a crypto-currency to help settle payments between clients in its wholesale payments business. JPM Coin is the first digital currency to be backed by a major US bank.

question: Kurkure, the snack brand owned by PepsiCo India, announced that it has appointed actor ________ as its brand ambassador.
description: Kurkure, the snack brand owned by PepsiCo India, announced that it has appointed actor Taapsee Pannu as its brand ambassador. The brand has also launched a television campaign to unveil a new brand positioning 'Khayal toh chatpata hai' (loosely translated into 'It's a fun thought') to celebrate the progressive thinking that young Indian homemakers bring in to the traditional Indian families.

question: The 5th India-Bangladesh Joint Consultative Committee Meeting was held in Which Place ?
description: The 5th India-Bangladesh Joint Consultative Committee Meeting was held in New Delhi .External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj and Foreign Affairs Minister of Bangladesh Dr Abdul Momen co-chaired the meeting.

question: Union Minister for Science & Technology, Earth Sciences, Environment, Forest and Climate Change, Dr. Harsh Vardhan, inaugurated India's First Agromet Forecast Centre In _________.
description: None

question: World number nine Saina Nehwal became the national champion for the fourth time, defeating world number six ________ in the women's singles final of Senior National Badminton Championship.
description: World number nine Saina Nehwal became the national champion for the fourth time, defeating world number six PV Sindhu in the women's singles final of Senior National Badminton Championship.

question: Flight Lieutenant ______becomes IAF's first woman flight engineer.
description: ndian Air Force inducted Flight Lieutenant Hina Jaiswal as the first woman flight engineer . Until last year, the Flight Engineer branch was exclusively the men's domain. the Chandigarhorigin lieutenant, successfully completed the six-month course at the 112 helicopter unit, Air Force Station, Yelahanka.

question: Actor-director _______ has won the 'Oscat award from animal rights organisation People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA) for directing his dog in A Star Is Born.
description: Actor-director Bradley Cooper has won the 'Oscat award from animal rights organisation People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals (PETA) for directing his dog in A Star Is Born. 166 . Bestselling British author _________has died from cancer at the age of 62.

question: India hikes customs duty on goods from which country to 200% ?
description: The Union government has hiked the basic customs duty on all goods imported from the neighbouring country to 200 percent with immediate effect. This comes after India revoked the 'Most Favoured Nation' (MFN) status to Pakistan on February 15 following the Pulwama terror strike, that killed 50 CRPF jawans.

question: Which State Assembly passed a Bill to make Sanskrit the second official language of the state?
description: The Himachal Pradesh Assembly passed a Bill to make Sanskrit the second official language of the state.

question: Argentina's President _______arrived on a three-day India visit to enhance cooperation in key sectors such as economy, nuclear technology and space.
description: Argentina's President Mauricio Macri arrived on a three-day India visit during which he will hold talks with Prime Minister Narendra Modi to enhance cooperation in key sectors such as economy, nuclear technology and space.

question: All the state government offices in Arunachal Pradesh will become paperless by_________, announced chief minister Pema Khandu recently.
description: All the state government offices in Arunachal Pradesh will become paperless by 2021, announced chief minister Pema Khandu recently.

question: Veteran West Indies batsman ________ will retire from One-Day International cricket after this year's World Cup in England and Wales.
description: Veteran West Indies batsman Chris Gayle will retire from One-Day International cricket after this year's World Cup in England and Wales. The 39-year-old opener is set to play his first international since last July against England .

question: The Indian Air Force carried out a mega exercise "Vayu Shakti" at ____________.
description: In the Vayu Shakti exercise, the IAF showcased fire power capability of indigenously-developed platforms like Light Combat Aircraft (LCA) Tejas, Advanced Light Helicopter (ALH) and efficacy of the Akash surface-to-air missile and Astra air-to-air missile.

question: Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu inaugurated the 10-floor Tower-1 of the Millennium Tower at Rushikonda in ___________.
description: Chief Minister N. Chandrababu Naidu inaugurated the 10-floor Tower-1 of the Millennium Tower at Rushikonda in the city. This is one of the major projects contemplated by the TDP to promote Visakhapatnam as a destination for investment in IT and ITES.

question: ________, the Swiss actor who portrayed Adolf Hitler in Oscar-nominated film Downfall and the kindly grandfather in Heidi, died of cancer.
description: Bruno Ganz, the Swiss actor who portrayed Adolf Hitler in Oscar-nominated film Downfall and the kindly grandfather in Heidi, died of cancer at his home in Zurich aged 77. Ganz had been active in German language theatre, film and television for more than 50 years and was the holder of the Iffland-Ring, the most important award for German-speaking actors.

question: _______, a Sudanese refugee has won the prestigious Martin Ennals human rights prize.
description: Abdul Aziz Muhamat, a Sudanese refugee who has been held in Australia's notorious offshore Manus Island processing centre for over five years, has won the prestigious Martin Ennals human rights prize, the UN refugee agency UNHCR has said.

question: The government has raised ____________ by additional offering of Bharat-22 Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) .
description: The government has raised Rs 10,000 crore by additional offering of Bharat- 22 Exchange Traded Fund (ETF) . The additional 'on-tap' offering of Bharat-22 ETF was opened for a single day with a base issue size of Rs 3,500 crore and an option to retain over-subscription.

question: Who was named as a brand ambassador for global sportswear giant, PUMA for a two-year period?
description: Six-time world women boxing champion MC Mary Kom was named as a brand ambassador for global sportswear giant, PUMA for a two-year period.

question: Pakistan conferred its highest civilian award Nishan-e-Pakistan on Saudi Crown Prince ___________for his "outstanding support" in reinvigorating the ties between the two countries.
description: The award was presented by Pakistan President Arif Alvi at a special ceremony held at the President House in Islamabad.

question: American author ___________ has won the Caledonia Novel Award 2019 with her unpublished novel The Unmaking of Eden.
description: American author Dakota Canon has won the Caledonia Novel Award 2019 with her unpublished novel The Unmaking of Eden. The Caledonia Novel Award is an international, Edinburgh-based award for unpublished and self-published novelists in any genre for adults and YA. This year saw more than 350 entries submitted from 31 different countries.

question: W S Broecker passed away , He was a famous __________.
description: A scientist who raised early alarms about climate change and popularised the term "global warming" has died. Wallace Smith Broecker was 87. The long-time Columbia University professor and researcher died at a New York City hospital.

question: Suresh Prabhu, launched SWAYATT, SWAYATT is an initiative to promote Start-ups, Women and Youth Advantage Through eTransactions on ___________.
description: Union Minister of Commerce & Industry and Civil Aviation, Suresh Prabhu, launched SWAYATT in New Delhi . SWAYATT is an initiative to promote Start-ups, Women and Youth Advantage Through eTransactions on Government e Marketplace (GeM). This will bring together the key stakeholders within the Indian entrepreneurial ecosystem to Government e- Marketplace the national procurement portal.

question: Commerce Minister launched which Mobile APP to gauge the actual issues faced by transporters on the road ?
description: Commerce Minister launch the SAFAR Mobile App. This app will help to gauge the actual issues faced by transporters on the road. The app tracks the incidence of a number of parameters faced by transporters and automatically records the location of the issue. The app is available in 8 languages.

question: __________ to organise National Workshop to Promote Healthy Diets from Local Food Systems.

option.a: The Food Processing Industry In India.

description: The NITI Aayog, in collaboration with National Centre of Excellence and Advanced Research on Diets (NCEAR-D) , Lady Irwin College and UNICEF India, is organizing a two-day national workshop to seek a common understanding of diet diversity problems in selected districts under POSHAN Abhiyan across India.

question: Two-day Regional Maritime Safety Conference 2019 begins in ___________.
description: The Regional Maritime Safety Conference 2019, being organized by India for the first time, commenced in Mumbai . The two-day conference will deliberate on issues related to assuring maritime safety in the India-ASEAN sub-region, safeguarding our shores and promoting maritime trade.

question: Union Tourism Minister, Shri K J Alphons, will chair the National Tourism Advisory Council (NTAC) meeting to be held in _________.
description: Union Tourism Minister, Shri K J Alphons, will chair the National Tourism Advisory Council (NTAC) meeting to be held on 21st - 22nd February 2019, at the site of the newly made Statue of Unity, Kevadiya in Gujarat.

question: Smriti Zubin Irani inaugurated "Muga silk seed production centre" in Tura, _____________.
description: Muga Silkworm Seed Production Centre (SSPC) , Tura, Meghalaya is one of the projects taken up directly by Centre Silk Board(CSB) for implementation under Integrated Sericulture Development Project (ISDP) of NERTPS for creation of seed infrastructure units in NE States.

question: Rajyavardhan Rathore presented the 7th National Photography Awards in delhi , The Lifetime Achievement Award is given to ____________.
description: The list of the Award winners is as under: Lifetime Achievement Award - Shri Ashok Dilwali Amateur Photographer of the Year - Shri Gurdeep Dhiman Special Mention Awards (Professional) - Shri Arun Sreedhar, Shri P.V. Sunderrao, Shri Kailash Mittal, Shri Mihir Singh, Ms. Ranita Roy. Special Mention Awards (Amateur) - Shri V. Ravi Kumar, Ms. S. Neelima, Shri Manish Jaisi, Shri Mahesh Balasaheb Lonkar, Shri Avijit Datta.

question: _____________ chaired the fifth meeting of the Island Development Agency (IDA) .
description: The Union Home Minister, Shri Rajnath Singh, chaired the fifth meeting of the Island Development Agency (IDA) . The Island Development Agency reviewed the progress made towards the program "Holistic development of islands".

question: Pan-India Emergency Number _______ launched for any emergency.
description: he Union Home Minister Shri Rajnath Singh and Minister for Women and Child Development, Smt. Maneka Sanjay Gandhi jointly launched the Women Safety initiative of Emergency Response Support System (ERSS) in 16 States/UTs and Mumbai city. People in these states and UTs can now call a single pan India number 112 for any emergency.

question: The 2019 edition of the India Innovation Growth Programme 2.0 (IIGP 2.0) was launched by Chandra Mohan Patowary in ____________.
description: With an aim at developing entrepreneurship in India, the 2019 edition of the India Innovation Growth Programme 2.0 (IIGP 2.0) was launched by Assam industries & commerce minister Chandra Mohan Patowary in Guwahati.

question: Actor__________conferred with 1st Biju Phukan Award by government of Assam.
description: Assam chief minister Sarbananda Sonowal conferred the first Biju Phukan Award 2019 to Assamese national award winning actor Bishnu Kharghoria during a programme at Chowkidinghee field here.The award carries Rs 2 lakh, a citation and an angabastra.

question: Additional Director General of West Bengal Police (law and order) Anuj Sharma was appointed as the new ________ Police Commissioner .
description: Additional Director General of West Bengal Police (law and order) Anuj Sharma was appointed as the new Kolkata Police Commissioner after his predecessor Rajeev Kumar was transferred as ADG & IGP of the Criminal Investigation Department (CID) .

question: DPIIT launched second edition of States' ranking on Startup initiatives , The Ranking Framework 2019 comprises of _________ and 30 action points.
description: The Ranking Framework 2019 comprises of 7 pillars and 30 action points. The pillars will assess States'/UTs efforts acrossinstitutional support, simplifying regulations, easing public procurement, incubation support, seed funding support, venture funding support and awareness and outreach related activities. The ranking exercise aims to evaluate measures taken by States/UTs during the assessment period from May 1, 2018 to June 30, 2019.

question: The 4th India-ASEAN Expo and Summit will be held on 21-23 February, 2019 in Which Place ?
description: The 4th India-ASEAN Expo and Summit will be held on 21-23 February, 2019 in New Delhi. This is a flagship event of Department of Commerce, being organised with FICCI to carry forward the momentum and to further strengthen India-ASEAN relations under the Act-East Policy.

question: Shri Ravi Shankar Prasad to Inaugurate VIVID 2019 to empower NIC officials in the field of technology, "VIVID" Stands for ?

option.a: Vision Insight and Voices as India goes Developed
option.b: Virtual Insight and Voices as India goes Digital
option.c: Vision Insight and Voices as India goes Digital
option.d: Vision Institute and Voices as India goes Digital

answer: Vision Insight and Voices as India goes Digital
description: "VIVID-Vision Insight and Voices as India goes Digital"- the District Informatics Officer (DIO) meet, is being organised by National Informatics Centre (NIC) on 21st and 22nd February, 2019.

question: MoU between __________ and University of British Columbia on forestry science .
description: Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) was signed today between Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change (MoEF&CC) and University of British Columbia (UBC) , Canada for next 10 years in New Delhi. Both the institutions shall explore opportunities for future collaborations in the field of forestry science through .

question: Shri Prakash Javadekar launched ________ to leverage technology in order to boost quality education in the country.
description: The Minister of Human Resource Development, Shri Prakash Javadekar launched Operation Digital Board to leverage technology in order to boost quality education in the country. Operation Digital Board is a revolutionary step which will make the learning as well as the teaching process interactive and popularize flipped learning as a pedagogical approach.

question: Cabinet Approves New Solar Energy Scheme For Farmers , The proposed scheme consists of three components. All three components combined, the scheme aims to add a solar capacity of 25,750 MW by ____________ .
description: The Cabinet Committee on Economic Affairs, chaired by Prime Minister Narendra Modi,approved the launch of Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan with the objective of providing financial and water security to farmers. The proposed scheme consists of three components. All three components combined, the scheme aims to add a solar capacity of 25,750 MW by 2022 . The total central financial support provided under the scheme would be Rs. 34,422 crore .

question: Who is the PayU India's new CEO ?
description: Naspers-owned PayU, a leading online payments service provider, has a new Chief Executive for its Indian operations in Anirban Mukherjee.

question: The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) introduced ______ a non- linked, participating endowment micro- insurance plan, which offers a combination of protection and savings.
description: The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) introduced 'Micro Bachat', a nonlinked, participating endowment micro- insurance plan, which offers a combination of protection and savings. the first time a micro insurance plan has been launched providing coverage up to `2 lakh.

question: The President of India, Shri Ram Nath Kovind, inaugurated the International Conference and Exhibition on Energy and Environment in ________.
description: The President of India, Shri Ram Nath Kovind, inaugurated the International Conference and Exhibition on Energy and Environment in New Delhi

question: Noted _________ writer Namvar Singh passed away in New Delhi .
description: Noted Hindi writer Namvar Singh passed away in New Delhi .Born on 28th July, 1926 in a village in Varanasi, Singh was the first chairman of JNU's Centre of Indian Languages. He had authored over a dozen books including 'Kavita Ke Naye Pratiman', 'Chhayavad' and 'Dusri Parampara Ki Khoj' among others.

question: Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh inaugurated a state-of-the-art national cyber forensic lab (NCFL) and the Delhi Police's cyber crime unit _________.
description: Boosting country's efforts in tackling cyber crimes, Union Home Minister Rajnath Singh inaugurated a state-of-the-art national cyber forensic lab (NCFL) and the Delhi Police's cyber crime unit 'CyPAD'. Both the cyber crime fighting units are based in a complex at Dwarka, Sector 16C.

question: India's first fulldome 3D Digital theatre inaugurated in Which City ?
description: India's first 'fulldome 3D Digital Theatre' at the Science City Kolkata was inaugurated by Union Culture Minister Mahesh Sharma . The 'fulldome 3D Digital Theatre' at the Science city was the first of its kind in India having a 23 metre titled dome to offer a fully immersive experience to the visitors.

question: The Finance Ministry announced to pump in __________ in 12 public sector banks (PSBs) in this fiscal.
description: The Finance Ministry announced to pump in Rs 48,239 crore in 12 public sector banks (PSBs) in this fiscal to help them maintain regulatory capital requirements and finance growth plans.

question: The International Cricket Council (ICC) banned UAE-based coach_________ for 10 years .
description: The International Cricket Council (ICC) banned UAE-based coach Irfan Ansari for 10 years after he was found guilty of making a "corrupt approach" to Pakistan captain Sarfaraz Ahmed in 2017.

question: China unveils world's first AI female news presenter , named Xin Xiaomeng.

option.d: Xin Hong Click here to View Answer

description: In a groundbreaking technological move, China's state-owned TV channel Xinhua has introduced the world's first ever Artificial Intelligence news anchor. Xinhua announced that in collaboration with Sogou (search engine) has created the world's first female AI news anchor, known as Xin Xiaomeng.

question: Which General Insurance Company announced the launch of 'Trip Protector' insurance policy ?
description: HDFC ERGO General Insurance Company, India's third-largest non-life insurance provider in the private sector, announced the launch of 'Trip Protector' insurance policy, a pioneering policy in the non-life insurance segment in India. In the event of a cancellation, either a flight or hotel booking, Trip Protector insurance policy will safeguard travellers financially against the cost of cancellation levied by Hotels or Airlines.

question: ________________ A Compendium on Digital India released to disseminate and propagate the success of Digital India among masses.
description: A Digital India Compendium on Digital Bharat, Saksham Bharat was released by Hon'ble Minister for Electronics &Information Technology and Law &Justice, Sh. Ravi Shankar Prasad at Stein Auditorium, India Habitat Centre, New Delhi.

question: The Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) hiked the interest rate on employees' provident fund from 8.55 per cent to _________ .
description: The Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) on Thursday hiked the interest rate on employees' provident fund by 10 basis point from 8.55 per cent to 8.65 per cent for the 2018-19 fiscal year. it would benefit around 6 crore subscribers of the retirement fund body.

question: Raj Kumar Barjatya passed away ,He was a famous ___________.
description: The man behind hit films like 'Hum Aapke Hai kaun' and 'Maine Pyar Kiya', veteran Bollywood producer and father of filmmaker Sooraj Barjatya, Raj Kumar Barjatya passed away in Mumbai.

question: _____________ State Police claims to have created the world's first and the very first police force in the country to induct humanoid robots.
description: The Kerala State Police claims to have created history by becoming one of the world's first and the very first police force in the country to induct humanoid robots.Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan formally introduced the humanoid robot into the state police force on Tuesday evening, at a function at the State Police Headquarters here.

question: India and Sri Lanka signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to establish a business centre for ICT incubators in ______________.
description: India and Sri Lanka signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to establish a business centre for ICT incubators in Jaffna through grant of 25 crore Sri Lankan rupees from India.

question: Sh.Nitin Gadkari, inaugurated and laid foundation stone for projects worth Rs 5,894 crore at Chandi Ghat in ____________.
description: The Union Minister for Road Transport & Highways, Shipping and Water Resources, River Development & Ganga Rejuvenation Shri Nitin Gadkari inaugurated and laid foundation stone for projects worth Rs 5,894 crore at Chandi Ghat in Haridwar

question: The world's largest bee - a giant insect roughly the size of a human thumb has been rediscovered in _____.
description: The world's largest bee - a giant insect roughly the size of a human thumb - has been rediscovered in a remote part of Indonesia in its first sighting in nearly 40 years.

question: Boxing Federation of India president__ has been elected as the President of the Foundation Board .
description: Boxing Federation of India president Ajay Singh has been elected as the President of the Foundation Board for Better Boxing, an elite International Boxing Association (AIBA) elite foundation.

question: Uttar Pradesh, Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath launched Scheme for Adolescent girls, the scheme focuses on girls aged between _________years .
description: The scheme focuses on girls aged between 11 to 14 years who have left studies and will take steps for proper nutrition and special care for them.

question: Over How many people have been treated free of cost under world's largest health care programme, Ayushman Bharat scheme?
description: Over 12 lakh people have been treated free of cost under Ayushman Bharat scheme, the world's largest health care programme, the CEO of Ayushman Bharat Dr Indu Bhushan said at the Medical Fair India 2019 in Delhi. Prime Minister Narendra Modi had launched the scheme in September last year.

question: Justice _____________takes oath as First Lokayukta of Nagaland.
description: The first Lok Ayukta of Nagaland, Justice Uma Nath Singh, took the oath of office on Friday evening. Nagaland Governor PB Acharya administered the oath to him at a function held at Raj Bhavan.

question: The Department of Atomic Energy (DAE) Media Meet held at Anushakti Bhavan in ______.
description: The Department of Atomic Energy (DAE), in collaboration with PIB Mumbai, organized a half-day event to provide an opportunity for the media interested in the sector to get a deeper understanding of issues germane to the field. The theme chosen for the Media Meet was "Radioisotopes in Healthcare - Radiopharmaceuticals for Nuclear Medicine: DAE Roles and Contributions".

question: Who will attend OIC meet as 'guest of honour in Abu Dhabi next month ?
description: In a significant move, India has been invited to the inaugural plenary of the foreign ministers' conclave of the OIC, a powerful grouping of Muslim majority nations, and External Affairs Minister Sushma Swaraj will attend it in Abu Dhabi next month as the 'guest of honour'.

question: Which state Cabinet approved the 'Khushi' scheme to provide free sanitary napkins to school girls ?
description: The Odisha Cabinet on Friday approved the 'Khushi' scheme to provide free sanitary napkins to school girls across the state. The scheme will benefit nearly 17.25 lakh school girls from Class VI to XII studying in government and government-aided schools. The state government will spend Rs.9466 crore over a period of five years to implement the schem

question: According to the World Economic Forum's Global Gender Gap Report ,Which country leads Asia in gender equality ?
description: According to the World Economic Forum's Global Gender Gap Report for 2018, the Philippines was ranked eighth among the 10 best performers. Iceland, Norway, Sweden, Finland, Nicaragua, Rwanda, New Zealand, Ireland, and Namibia are the other countries on the list.

question: ___________ launched Rs 100-crore Sweet Revolution scheme under which 1,207 farmers will be given Rs 1 lakh for bee keeping.
description: None

question: ___________is the capital city of Sudan .
description: Sudan or the Sudan, officially the Republic of the Sudan, is a country in Northeast Africa.

question: Which Union Minister presented the Digital India Awards on 22 February?
description: The Digital India Awards have been instituted under the ambit of the National Portal of India by National Informatics Centre, MeitY, to promote exemplary initiatives in egovernance using the medium of World Wide Web.

question: IIFL Home Finance signed a MoU with the_________ government for capacity building for affordable housing through credit-linked subsidy scheme .
description: IIFL Home Finance signed a memorandum of understanding (MoU) with the Maharashtra government for capacity building for affordable housing through credit-linked subsidy scheme (CLSS) under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY).

question: Srei Equipment Finance has tied up with state-owned __________to jointly provide financing for construction and farm equipment.
description: Srei Equipment Finance, a wholly owned subsidiary of Srei Infrastructure Finance, has tied up with state-owned Syndicate Bank to jointly provide financing for construction and farm equipment.

question: Modi Launches PM-KISAN Scheme, Under this__________ will be paid to 12 crore small and marginal farmers.
description: The Centre had announced the PM-KISAN scheme in the 2019-20 Interim Budget. Under this, Rs 6,000 will be paid to 12 crore small and marginal farmers holding cultivable land of up to two hectares per year in three instalments. the funds will be electronically transferred to the bank accounts of beneficiaries.

question: The six-day 11th Ankiya Bhaona Samaroh to begin at Goalpara in _________.
description: The six-day 11th Ankiya Bhaona Samaroh organised by Guwahati-based Sattriya Kendra of Sangeet Natak Akademi, New Delhi in collaboration with the Goalpara district administration and Goalpara College, will get underway at Goalpara .

question: ____________ has launched a cruise missile from a submarine for the first time during an ongoing annual military drill in the Strait of Hormuz .
description: Iran has launched a cruise missile from a submarine for the first time during an ongoing annual military drill in the Strait of Hormuz. Anti-ship cruise missile" was launched from a Ghadir-class submarine.

question: Donald Keene died of heart failure at a Tokyo hospital , He was a _________.
description: Donald Keene, a scholar of Japanese literature who became the first foreigner to receive the country's highest cultural award, died of heart failure at a Tokyo hospital. Keene, 96, was known for introducing Japan's culture in the United States and around the world through his scholarship and translations of classical and modern Japanese literature.

question: India defender _____________ was awarded with the 2018 Player of the Year award by the Asian Hockey Federation.
description: India defender Harmanpreet Singh was awarded with the 2018 Player of the Year award by the Asian Hockey Federation while women's team striker Lalremsiami bagged the Rising Player of The Year prize.

question: Central Excise Day is celebrated on which date ?
description: Central Excise Day is commemorated every year all across the India on 24th of February to encourage the employees of excise department to carry out the central excise duty all over the India in better way in order to prevent the corruption in goods manufacturing business as well as implement other rules to carry out best possible excise services.

question: India's ace badminton player and Olympic silver-medallist _________ flew in homemade combat fighter jet Tejas aircraft.
description: India's ace badminton player and Olympic silver-medallist PV Sindhu flew in homemade combat fighter jet Tejas aircraft at the ongoing Aero India air show in Bengaluru

question: RBI would merged three NBFC categories into a new category called ____________.
description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has merged three categories of NBFCs - asset finance, loan companies and investment companies - into one new category called NBFC-investment and credit company (NBFC-ICC) to ease operational flexibility of these institutions

question: Prime Minister dedicated the National War Memorial in ______.
description: Prime Minister dedicated the National War Memorial at the iconic India Gate complex in New Delhi to the fallen soldiers who laid their lives in the several wars India has fought since Independence as rose petals were showered on the newly built structure.

question: FAGMIL signs MoU with ____________Government to establish Rs. 605 crores White cement Plant Project.
description: Under its diversification programme, FCI Aravali Gypsum and Minerals India Limited (FAGMIL)has taken up a project to establish a white cement plant near village NohraDhar in Sirmourdistrict, Himachal Pradesh, at a project cost of approximately Rs. 605 crores.

question: Union Minister of Commerce & Industry and Civil Aviation, Suresh Prabhu, inaugurated National Institutes of Design (NID) in Madhya Pradesh and in___________.
description: Union Minister of Commerce & Industry and Civil Aviation, Suresh Prabhu, inaugurated National Institutes of Design (NID) at Bhopal in Madhya Pradesh and Jorhat in Assam through video conference from New Delhi.

question: Rajnath Singh to inaugurate 29 infra projects of CAPF in ___________.
description: HomeMinister Rajnath Singh will inaugurate 29 infrastructure projects bothresidential and non-residential buildings of Central Armed Police Forces in NewDelhi. These projects have been constructed at various locations across the country at atotal cost of Rs. 1,714.97 crore. the projects involve 53 non-residentialbuildings and 4,723 residential quarters.

question: Who has been inaugurated the 4th Global Digital Health Partnership Summit in New Delhi .
description: Health Minister JP Nadda inaugurated the 4th Global Digital Health Partnership Summit in New Delhi . Mr Nadda said, the government is committed to secure Universal Health Coverage for the underprivileged and deprived section of the society. nearly 13 lakh poor people have availed the benefits of Ayushman Bharat scheme.

question: Govt launches _______________ to keep people informed about ongoing Railway works.
description: Railway Minister Piyush Goyal launched Rail Drishti Dashboard in New Delhi . Mr Goyal said the Dashboard has been launched to keep people informed about the work going on in the Railways across the country.

question: ___________ has won the bid to operate five out of six airports that were put for privatisation by the central government.
description: The Adani group has won the bid to operate five out of six airports that were put for privatisation by the central government.

question: The President of India, Shri Ram Nath Kovind, presented the Gandhi Peace Prize _______for the years 2017.
description: The Gandhi Peace Prize was presented to the Vivekananda Kendra, Kanyakumari for 2015, jointly to the Akshaya Patra Foundation and the Sulabh International for 2016, to the Ekal Abhiyan Trust for 2017, and to Shri Yohei Sasakawa for 2018.

question: The meeting of 20th India-Italy Joint Commission for Economic Cooperation (JCEC) began in ________ .
description: The meeting of 20th India-Italy Joint Commission for Economic Cooperation (JCEC) began in New Delhi . The JCEC is an institutional mechanism for bilateral trade engagement held at the level of Minister of Commerce and Industry of the two countries.

question: The National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) is conducting a two-day national workshop on heat wave risk reduction , The workshop, to be held at _______.
description: The National Disaster Management Authority (NDMA) is conducting a two-day national workshop on heat wave risk reduction on 27-28 February, 2019. The workshop, to be held at Nagpur, has been organised in collaboration with the Maharashtra Government.

question: Assam Chief Minister Sarbananda Sonowal laid the foundation stone of Bhogeswar Baruah Sports School at Sarusajai Sports Complex in _______.
description: Assam Chief Minister Sarbananda Sonowal laid the foundation stone of Bhogeswar Baruah Sports School at Sarusajai Sports Complex in Guwahati .

question: Who is the US Ambassador to India ?
description: US Ambassador to India, Kenneth Juster will arrive in Guwahati on his maiden visit to the state of Assam

question: Iran's Foreign Minister ________ who was the lead negotiator in the 2015 nuclear deal, has resigned.
description: Iran's Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif, who was the lead negotiator in the 2015 nuclear deal, has resigned

question: ___________ wins Cannes International Open.
description: Grandmaster Abhijeet Gupta finished with 7.5 points at the Cannes International Open to win the tournament. Abhijeet registered 6 wins and three draws at the Cannes International Open on February 2019.

question: India's ________ achieved his career-best ranking, rising three places to 94th in the latest list.
description: In Tennis, India's Prajnesh Gunneswaran achieved his career-best ranking, rising three places to 94th in the latest list. Ramkumar Ramanathan dropped nine spots to 137, while Yuki Bhambri further slipped to 171.

question: DRDO, successfully test fired indigenously developed Quick Reach Surface-to-Air missiles, QRSAMs, from ITR Chandipur, off the _______.
description: Defence Research and Development Organisation, DRDO, successfully test fired indigenously developed Quick Reach Surface-to-Air missiles, QRSAMs, from ITR Chandipur, off the Odisha Coast. The two missiles were tested for different altitude and conditions.

question: Civil Aviation Ministry organising 'Aviation Conclave 2019' with theme of ___________.
description: The Ministry of Civil Aviation, in association with Airports Authority of India, AAICLAS and Confederation of Indian Industry, is organizing the Aviation Conclave 2019 with an overarching theme of "Flying for All" in New Delhi.

question: _____________and _________ out of RBI's weak-bank watchlist.
description: The RBI on Tuesday lifted lending curbs on two more public sector banks (PSBs) - Allahabad Bank and Corporation Bank - by removing them from its weakbank watchlist. Private sector Dhanlaxmi Bank too has been taken out of the Prompt Corrective Action (PCA) Framework.

question: Assam's Chief Minister PRANAM Commission, Who is the Chief Minister of Assam ?
description: Assam Chief Minister Sarbananda Sonowal inaugurated the Assam Employees Parents Responsibility and Norms for Accountability and Monitoring (PRANAM) Commission.

question: The Defence Acquisition Council has approved the acquisition of defence equipment for about ______Crores rupees.
description: The Defence Acquisition Council has approved the acquisition of defence equipment for about 2700 Crores rupees. The approval include acquistion of three Cadet Training ships for the Navy, which will provide basic sea training to officer cadets including women officer under trainees.

question: Former Sri Lanka Cricket captain __________ has been banned from cricket for two years.
description: Former Sri Lanka Cricket captain Sanath Jayasuriya has been banned from cricket for two years. ICC said Jayasuriya admitted to breaching two counts of the ICC Anti-Corruption Code.

question: Actor won the silver medal at the National Equestrian Championship (NEC) .
description: Actor Randeep Hooda won the silver medal at the National Equestrian Championship (NEC) and called it a proud moment. On the work front, the "Sarbjit" actor was last seen on screen in "Baaghi 2". He will next be seen in "Dhaka".

question: The 'Loong Palace Hurun Global Rich List 2019' was released recently. Which billionaire topped the list?
description: Jeff Bezos of Amazon retains the top spot in list with his personal wealth up a staggering $24 bn to $147 bn. Bezos has created $100 bn of wealth in three years, earning the equivalent of 'a Bill Gates' in just three years.

question: A joint military exercise Sampriti 2019 between India and Bangladesh will be conducted at Tangail in __________.
description: A joint military exercise Sampriti 2019 between India and Bangladesh will be conducted at Tangail in Bangladesh. It will be the eighth edition of the exercise which is hosted alternately by both countries. 293 Who was appointed as the non-executive chairman of the IDBI bank?

question: Petroleum Minister ________ gave 34 crore rupees of Indian Oil Corporation for clean Ganga movement.
description: Petroleum Minister Dhramendra Pradhan gave 34 crore rupees of Indian Oil Corporation for clean Ganga movement. After receiving the grant , Union Minister Nitin Gadkari said, nearly 40 Ganga tributaries will be cleaned.

question: Nigerian President _____________ has been re-elected for a second four year term.
description: Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari has been re-elected for a second four year term.

question: Bharti Airtel partners with _________to automate data centre network.
description: Finnish telecommunication giant Nokia said Bharti Airtel would deploy solution from Nokia's Nuage Networks to upgrade its data centres. Nuage Networks is a Nokia venture focused on software-defined networking solution.

question: and Saurabh Chaudhary clinched the gold medal in the 10m Air Pistol Mixed Team event at the ISSF World Cup in New Delhi .
description: Manu Bhaker and Saurabh Chaudhary clinched the gold medal in the 10m Air Pistol Mixed Team event at the ISSF World Cup in New Delhi . Ranxin Jiang and Bowen Zhang of China won silver while the Republic of Korea pair Minjung Kim and Daehun Park got the bronze.

question: Which State's cabinet approves State Film Policy 2019 ?
description: Naveen Patnaik-led state cabinet gave its nod to the Odisha State Film Policy-2019. The policy will promote quality Odia films, facilitate film tourism in the state, establish Odisha as a destination for film shooting and improve screen density in the state.

question: Who is the author of the book titled 'Quality, Accreditation, and Ranking' .
description: Vice President M Venkaiah Naidu launched the book titled 'Quality, Accreditation, and Ranking - A Silent Revolution in the Offing in Indian Higher Education' edited by Education Promotion Society for India's (EPSI) Alternate President Dr. H Chaturvedi in New Delhi.

question: ___________signs MoU with Indian Oil on fuel needs for national waterways.
description: Inland Waterways Authority of India (IWAI) and Indian Oil Corporation (IOCL) signed a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) for jointly developing infrastructure for fuels, lubricating oil, LPG, Natural Gas and any other related fuel and gas for meeting the requirement of National Waterways

question: Assam Chief Minister inaugurated Training of Small Tea Growers on Tea Quality titled ________ at Assam Agricultural University in Jorhat.
description: Assam Chief Minister Sarbandna Sonowal inaugurated Training of Small Tea Growers on Tea Quality titled 'Mission Assam QualiTea' at Assam Agricultural University in Jorhat.

question: Assam Chief Minister ____________laid the foundation stone of 70 MW Solar Park at Japisajia village of Amguri in Sivasagar district.
description: Assam Chief Minister Sarbananda Sonowal laid the foundation stone of 70 MW Solar Park at Japisajia village of Amguri in Sivasagar district in a bid to boost power production and promoting clean energy in the state.

question: India Korea Business Symposium was hosted by Invest India and Korean Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KCCI)in _______ .
description: India Korea Business Symposium was hosted by Invest India and Korean Chamber of Commerce and Industry (KCCI)in Seoul .The Symposium was organized to felicitate the Korean business community on their success in India and to present more opportunities for Korean business in India.

question: Union Minister of Textiles, __________, launched five short term courses at NIFT Panchkula, Haryana.
description: Union Minister of Textiles, Smriti Zubin Irani, launched five short term courses at NIFT Panchkula, Haryana .The permanent campus building is under construction and is expected to be completed by June, 2020.

question: Steel Minister to present___ Prime Minister's Trophy for Excellence in Performance of Integrated Steel Plants.
description: Union Steel Minister, Chaudhary Birender Singh, will give away 25thPrime Minister's Trophy for Excellence in Performance of Integrated Steel Plants for 2016-17 in New Delhi on 1st March 2019.

question: India lost to __________ 0-1 in their opening match of the Turkish Women's Cup football in Alanya, Turkey .
description: India lost to Uzbekistan 0-1 in their opening match of the Turkish Women's Cup football in Alanya, Turkey . An early goal by Uzbekistan's Burhanova Malika in the 4th minute made the difference as India struggled for the equaliser in the remainder of the game.

question: The Minister for Human Resource Development ______________ launched the Scheme for Higher Education Youth in Apprenticeship and Skills (SHREYAS) for youth pursuing higher education.
description: To provide industry apprenticeship opportunities to graduates in nontechnical fields, passing out from the National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS) in April 2019, the Minister for Human Resource Development Prakash Javadekar launched the Scheme for Higher Education Youth in Apprenticeship and Skills (SHREYAS) for youth pursuing higher education.

question: IDBI Bank and __________ have signed a bancassurance agreement under which the lender will offer LIC's insurance products at its branches.
description: IDBI Bank and Life Insurance Corporation of India have signed a bancassurance agreement under which the lender will offer LIC's insurance products at its branches.

question: Which Software firm has partnered with Niti Aayog's Atal Innovation Mission (AIM) to enhance digital literacy, creativity skills ?
description: Software firm Adobe has partnered with Niti Aayog's Atal Innovation Mission (AIM) to collaborate on enhancing digital literacy and creativity skills.

question: Shri Dharmendra Pradhan handed over __________ Letter of Intent under SATAT scheme.
description: Minister of Petroleum and Natural Gas & Skill development and Entrepreneurship Shri Dharmendra Pradhan handed over the 100th Letter of Intent (LOI) to the Compressed Bio-Gas(CBG) Entrepreneur (producer) under the SATAT scheme. SATAT is an initiative aimed at providing a Sustainable Alternative Towards Affordable Transportation as a developmental effort that would benefit both vehicle-users as well as farmers and entrepreneurs.

question: England women beat _________ by two wickets in third ODI in Mumbai .
description: England women's team defeated India by two wickets in the third and final ODI in Mumbai .England scored 208-8 in 48.5 overs to grab two crucial points as the three-game series is part of ICC Women's Championship.

question: India and Brunei sign Agreement for the Exchange of Information and Assistance in Collection with respect to Taxes. What is the Currency of Brunei?
description: The Government of Republic of India and the Government of His Majesty the Sultan and Yang Di-Pertuan of Brunei Darussalam signed an Agreement for the Exchange of Information and Assistance in Collection with respect to Taxes (TIEA) in New Delhi.

question: The 'Union Home Minister's Medal for Excellence in Investigation' for the year 2018 have been awarded to How many Police personnel ?
description: The 'Union Home Minister's Medal for Excellence in Investigation' for the year 2018 have been awarded to 101 Police personnel belonging to 25 States/UT/ Central Investigating Agencies .

question: Booker Prize for fiction secures new financial backer_________to funding the Booker Prize for English-language novels.
description: Crankstart has committed to funding the Booker Prize for Englishlanguage novels and the International Booker Prize for translated works for at least five years.

question: West Bengal Education Minister inaugurated a web portal ______ to provide real-time data on state-run and aided schools.
description: West Bengal Education Minister Partha Chatterjee inaugurated a web portal "Banglar Shiksha" which is set to provide real-time data on state-run and aided schools.The portal, Banglar Shiksha (banglarshiksha.gov.in), will be up and running in two months time.

question: In Which State , CZPDC , Bhopal and WZPDC, Indore Indore have been awarded the Saubhagya award under Pradhanmantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana ?
description: In Madhya Pradesh, the Central Zone Power Distribution Company, Bhopal and West Zone Power Distribution Company, Indore have been awarded the Saubhagya award under Pradhanmantri Sahaj Bijli Har Ghar Yojana at the National Conference of Energy Ministers. The award included 100 crore rupees each.
